footer.finalmessage: our objective as a company is to revolutionize the organization of agencies regarding their local tours and trips. Offering security and confidence from the moment of the sale until the end of the journey.

homeDescription.titleDescription: Track Travel is a web/mobile application that facilitates all interactions between Travel Agencies and tourists around the world. Among the most important functionalities we can mention transport tracking, direct communication between the parties, secure sales service and statistical information collected to improve the performance of the service provider. Track Travel has arrived to set a new standard of service, taking your travel agency to a new level.

column1.title: Simplicity
column1.description: This application was designed to be totally intuitive. Whether you are a partner agency or a tourist, in a matter of a few minutes, it is possible to understand and use all the tools offered. And if any doubts arise, we have explanatory videos and customer service to help you with whatever you need.

column2.title: Security
column2.description: Instead of trying to recreate the wheel, we choose to work with reputable companies when dealing with sensitive data. All of your financial transactions within our site are processed externally from end to end. We take care of the rest.

column3.title: Automation
column3.description: Have you already imagined, as a company, to automatically count with accurate performance statistics? Working with our application it will be a matter of a couple of clicks to have information such as: financial statistics, number of passengers transported, approximate location of strong points of sale, kilometers traveled by your transports, performance of your guides, etc.

column4.title: Confidence
column4.description: Track Travel is a company in constant evolution that seeks to transmit confidence by offering solidity in our proposal as well as in our daily commitment to business growth. We know that growing is easier when accompanied and we want to invite you to be part of this adventure. The sky is the limit.
